description: Brown Hair, Blue Green Eyes, Good Build, 6'0" on a good day.  I like long walks on the beach, Lambda Chi is awesome.
aspects: My favorite things about Lamda Chi are our philanthropic efforts such as Watermelon Bust, game days, Formal, Camp out, and road trips.
quotes: "'Why not,' is a slogan for an interesting life.  Take advantage of the opportunities before you."
name: Michael Gervais
